Hypotheses:
n, m: nat

m + S n = S n + m

```coq

Qed.```

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

```coq
Proof.
intro client; intro id; intro o; intro os.
split.
left.
apply key_in_output_list with (client := client) (id := id) (o := o); auto.
right.
intro contra.
apply not_all_not_some in contra as [not_in_or_absent].
destruct not_in_or_absent as [not_in | absent].
* apply not_in in contra as [not_in_client | not_in_id | not_in_o].
  -- exfalso; apply contra; auto.
  -- exfalso; apply contra; auto.
  -- exfalso; apply contra; auto.
* apply absent; auto.
Qed.

original: intro client; intro id; intro o; intro os. split. left. apply key_in_output_list with (client := client) (id := id) (o := o); auto. right. intro contra. apply not_all_not_some in contra as [not_in_or_absent]. destruct not_in_or_absent as [not_in | absent]. * apply not_in in contra as [not_in_client | not_in_id | not_in_o]. -- exfalso; apply contra; auto. -- exfalso; apply contra; auto. -- exfalso; apply contra; auto. * apply absent; auto.
